title: Google\Cloud\Dataform\V1beta1\WorkflowInvocation\InvocationConfig
name: InvocationConfig
description:
Includes various configuration options for this workflow invocation.

If both included_targets and included_tags are unset, all actions will be included.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataform.v1beta1.WorkflowInvocation.InvocationConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.included_targets
params.description: Immutable. The set of action identifiers to include.

params.name: data.included_tags
params.description: Immutable. The set of tags to include.

params.name: data.transitive_dependencies_included
params.description: Immutable. When set to true, transitive dependencies of included actions will be executed.

params.name: data.transitive_dependents_included
params.description: Immutable. When set to true, transitive dependents of included actions will be executed.

params.name: data.fully_refresh_incremental_tables_enabled
params.description: Immutable. When set to true, any incremental tables will be fully refreshed.
